channel.title: Gaming Lagoon free gaming stuff!
channel.description:
Gaming lagoon is the only working site that will give you free game stuff look on youtube for proof
the signup link is http://www.gaminglagoon.com/?ref=167558 paste that into your address bar and signup!!!
it is totally free and there are other sites to they are a big network
although you do have to do offers but the offers dont cost you a cent!!!
shipping and handling is free and you can do custom orders and order off ebay using points!!!
its 100% legit!
sorry for posting it here but i had no other forums to go to
on the offers you can use a fake address
but on the website make sure you use the real one
